feed.title: Spacepad Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Spacepad: v1.0.0
entry.content: The first release of Spacepad, the self hosted and cloud hosted meeting room display app.

entry.title: New release for Spacepad: v1.1.0
entry.content: Multiple new sources to connect calendars from (as strongly requested) and an upgraded onboarding experience ü§ù - Added Google personal & workspace integration - Added CalDAV integration, tested with Nextcloud - Upgraded the onboarding experience - Added webhook support for registration and onboarding events - Added Sentry monitoring

entry.title: New release for Spacepad: v1.1.1
entry.content: This release includes several bugfixes, documentation updates and added error handling.
